nodes.long_description:
# Experience the most spine-tingling VR mystery adventure of your life.

The classic game that chilled you to the bone in the 90s has been brought back to life, with cutting-edge VR technology that delivers an atmospheric story like no other. 

{1886847968418683}

Six guests have been welcomed to the foreboding mansion. 

But something sinister is at play...

 The wealthy recluse and toymaker, Henry Stauf, hides in the shadows, and there is a dark power here, shrouded in mysteries. Who is the 7th Guest? What does Henry want with them? And who will live to tell the tale?

As you explore the eerie mansion, the puzzles become increasingly challenging, and there are dangers lurking around every corner, with every shadow, creak, and flicker of light adding to the haunting tension.

Unlock new rooms and uncover hidden secrets, all while trying to keep your wits about you against the eerie horrors. The 7th Guest VR is the ultimate adventure for fans of mystery-puzzle games and those seeking a new and terrifying VR experience.

{1455860938655165}
nodes.short_description: The iconic mystery game, The 7th Guest, has been brought back to life with cutting-edge VR technology, that delivers an atmospheric story like no other. Explore the foreboding mansion, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover its dark secrets. The 7th Guest VR is the ultimate mystery adventure, and it's time for you to experience it for yourself.

El icónico juego de misterio, The 7th Guest, regresa a la vida con una tecnología de VR revolucionaria que ofrece una historia envolvente e inigualable. Explora la fatídica mansión, resuelve los desafiantes acertijos y descubre sus oscuros secretos. The 7th Guest VR es la aventura de misterio definitiva y es hora de que la vivas por tu cuenta.

Unutulmaz gizem oyunu The 7th Guest, eşi benzeri olmayan atmosferik bir hikâye sunan en son VR teknolojisi ile hayata döndürüldü. Ürkütücü malikâneyi keşfet, zorlu bulmacaları çöz ve malikânenin karanlık sırlarını ortaya çıkar. The 7th Guest VR, gizem dolu bir maceranın en üst noktasıdır ve bunu bizzat deneyimleme vaktin geldi.
作为业界标杆的悬疑游戏，《The 7th Guest》具有独到又波澜壮阔的故事，现如今它带着领先时代的VR技术，以全新的面貌归来。探索受诅咒的宅邸，解决具有挑战性的谜题，并揭开隐藏其中的黑暗秘密。《The 7th Guest》将引领你走进终极的悬疑冒险之旅，现在是你亲自体验的时候了。

Ikoninen mysteeripeli The 7th Guest on herätetty henkiin uusimmalla VR-teknologialla, joka mahdollistaa ennennäkemättömän tunnelmallisen tarinankerronnan. Tutki pahaenteistä kartanoa, ratkaise haastavia pulmia ja selvitä synkät salaisuudet. The 7th Guest VR on kaikkien aikojen mysteeriseikkailu, joka on koettava itse.

Het iconische mysteriespel, The 7th Guest, is nieuw leven ingeblazen met geavanceerde VR-technologie die een ambiance creëert als geen ander. Verken het onheilspellende landhuis, los puzzels op en onthul de duistere geheimen. The 7th Guest VR is het ultieme mysterie-avontuur en het is tijd om dit zelf te ervaren.

Det ikoniske mysteriespil The 7th Guest er blevet vakt til live igen med topmoderne VR-teknologi, der leverer en stemningsfyldt, unik historie. Udforsk det ildevarslende palæ, løs udfordrende hovedbrud, og opdag dets mørke hemmeligheder. The 7th Guest VR er det ultimative eventyrlige mysterie, og det er tid til, at du selv oplever det.
名作ミステリーゲーム『The 7th Guest』が、最新VRテクノロジーで蘇り、雰囲気たっぷりのストーリーを余すところなくお届けします。不気味な雰囲気漂う邸宅を探索し、手ごたえのあるパズルを解き、その暗い秘密をあらわにしましょう。『The 7th Guest VR』は究極のミステリーアドベンチャー。自分の身体でご体験ください。

O icônico jogo de mistério, The 7th Guest, ganha vida nova com tecnologia VR de ponta, oferecendo uma história atmosférica sem igual. Explore a mansão assustadora, resolva enigmas desafiadores e desvende os segredos sombrios. The 7th Guest VR é a mais incrível aventura de mistério do mundo, e chegou sua vez de vivenciá-la.

Культовая игра-загадка, The 7th Guest, снова оживает за счет современных VR-технологий и погрузит вас в атмосферную историю, которой нет равных. Изучайте зловещий особняк, решайте сложные головоломки и раскрывайте темные тайны. The 7th Guest VR — это отличное приключение-головоломка, которую нельзя пропускать.
독특한 방식으로 분위기 있는 스토리를 전달하는 유명 미스터리 게임 7번째 손님이 최신 VR기술로 되살아납니다. 불길함으로 가득한 저택을 탐험하고 난이도 있는 퍼즐을 풀어 저택의 어두운 비밀을 파헤치십시오. 궁극의 미스터리 어드벤처 7번째 손님 VR을 여러분이 직접 경험해 볼 차례입니다.

Kultowa gra „The 7th Guest” została przywrócona do życia dzięki najnowocześniejszej technologii VR, która przedstawi tę klimatyczną historię w zupełnie nowym wymiarze. Przemierzaj złowieszczą posiadłość, rozwiązuj niezwykłe zagadki i odkrywaj mroczne sekrety. „The 7th Guest VR” to wspaniała przygoda pełna tajemnic. Przeżyj ją już dziś.

Das ikonische Rätselspiel „The 7th Guest“ wurde mit hochmoderner VR-Technologie zu neuem Leben erweckt und lockt mit einer unglaublich atmosphärischen Geschichte. Erkunde das unheimliche Anwesen, löse herausfordernde Rätsel und enthülle seine dunklen Geheimnisse. „The 7th Guest VR“ ist das ultimative Rätselabenteuer und jetzt ist der ideale Zeitpunkt, es selbst zu erleben.

Il mitico gioco di misteri, The 7th Guest, è tornato con una tecnologia VR all’avanguardia, per presentarti una storia ricca di atmosfera senza precedenti. Esplora l’inquietante villa, risolvi complessi rompicapi e svelane gli oscuri segreti. The 7th Guest VR è l’avventura di mistero definitiva, ed è il momento che anche tu la provi sulla tua stessa pelle.

nodes.long_description:
Le jeu classique qui vous a fait frissonner dans les années 90 a été ramené à la vie, avec une technologie VR de pointe qui offre une intrigue à nulle autre pareille. 
{1889497548159923}

Six invités ont été accueillis dans le manoir inquiétant. Mais quelque chose de sinistre est en jeu. Le riche fabricant de jouets reclus, Henry Stauf, se cache dans l'ombre, et un pouvoir obscur, enveloppé de mystères, est dans les lieux. Qui est le 7ème Invité ? Que leur veut Henry ? Et qui survivra pour raconter l'histoire ? 

 Au fur et à mesure que vous explorez l'étrange manoir, les énigmes deviennent de plus en plus difficiles, et des dangers se cachent à chaque coin de rue, chaque ombre, craquement et scintillement de lumière ajoutant à la tension obsédante. 

 Déverrouillez de nouvelles salles et découvrez des secrets cachés, tout en essayant de garder votre esprit clair contre les horreurs étranges. The 7th Guest VR est l'aventure ultime pour les fans de jeux de mystère et ceux qui recherchent une nouvelle et terrifiante expérience VR.

Êtes-vous prêt à affronter vos peurs ?

{1000104751642014}
nodes.short_description: The 7th Guest, le jeu de mystère emblématique, a été ramené à la vie grâce à une technologie VR de pointe, qui offre une intrigue à nulle autre pareille. Explorez l’inquiétant manoir, résolvez des énigmes difficiles et découvrez ses sombres secrets. The 7th Guest VR est l'aventure de mystère ultime, et il est temps de l'expérimenter par vous-même.

Det ikoniska mysteriespelet The 7th Guest har fått nytt liv med banbrytande VR-teknologi som ger dig en atmosfärisk berättelse som inte liknar något du upplevt förr. Utforska den olycksbådande herrgården och blottlägg dess mörka hemligheter. The 7th Guest VR är det ultimata mysterieäventyret, och det är hög tid att du får uppleva det själv.

Det ikoniske mysteriespillet The 7th Guest er tilbake med banebrytende VR-teknologi som leverer en stemningsfull historie uten like. Utforsk det uhyggelige herskapshuset, løs utfordrende gåter og avslør dets mørke hemmeligheter. 7th Guest VR er det ultimate mystiske eventyret, og det er på tide for deg å oppleve det selv.
利用尖端 VR 技術，這款經典神秘遊戲《The 7th Guest》現已重磅回歸，帶來前所未有的氛圍和故事。玩家可以探索這棟陰森的豪宅，解決充滿挑戰的謎題，並揭開裡面所暗藏的黑暗秘密。是時候親自體驗這款終極神秘冒險遊戲《The 7th Guest VR》了！

nodes.long_description:
Experience the most spine-tingling VR mystery adventure of your life.

The classic game that chilled you to the bone in the 90s has been brought back to life, with cutting-edge VR technology that delivers an atmospheric story like no other. 

Six guests have been welcomed to the foreboding mansion. But something sinister is at play. The wealthy recluse and toymaker, Henry Stauf, hides in the shadows, and there is a dark power here, shrouded in mysteries. Who is the 7th Guest? What does Henry want with them? And who will live to tell the tale?

As you explore the eerie mansion, the puzzles become increasingly challenging, and there are dangers lurking around every corner, with every shadow, creak, and flicker of light adding to the haunting tension.

Unlock new rooms and uncover hidden secrets, all while trying to keep your wits about you against the eerie horrors.The 7th Guest VR is the ultimate adventure for fans of mystery-puzzle games and those seeking a new and terrifying VR experience.

Are you ready to face your fears?
nodes.short_description: The iconic mystery game, The 7th Guest, has been brought back to life with cutting-edge VR technology, that delivers an atmospheric story like no other. Explore the foreboding mansion, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover its dark secrets. The 7th Guest VR is the ultimate mystery adventure, and it's time for you to experience it for yourself.

nodes.change_log:
Fixes blocking bug with Workshop Altar puzzle
Fixes incorrect hand offset after use of tiny hat
Fixes two dolls can be placed in one seat in rare conditions
Fixes Heine floating in front of railing
Fixes rare crashes
Fixes pool table puzzle validating before all balls are sunk
Fixes achievement unlock issues

Quest 3 improvements:
- Higher resolution textures
- Full group scenes (no fade in/out of characters)
- Higher Pixel density

Bug fixes and improvements:
- Fixed Achievements 
- Nursery and Temple's Room are stable now
- A circular indicator appears where to stand to trigger volumetrics
- Extended finger position for puzzles, to improve puzzle interaction
- Hands no longer stuck on snapped objects 
- Added tutorial text on the Spirit board, to explain how to use planchette
- Martine Burden's body now visibly falls down the stairs
- More natural timing of VO lines for music boxes & Stauf chronicles
- Lantern can no longer drop out of players hands
- Added tips for the loading screen
- Stauf VO on Start menu
- Height offset for players
- Adjustable Vignette speed and radius
- Music boxes keep their level of volume
- Menu pointer also adheres to dominant hand selection
- Profile screen shows progression per profile
- Faster Smooth Rotation setting
- Subtitles follow camera movement more quickly
- Music boxes no longer stop playing when you swap it between hands
- Smaller head collision so it's more unlikely to trigger the "out of bounds" message
- Clearer "out of bounds" message, no longer refers to play space
- Several texture look sharper (saved child painting, cockroach trail)
- Spirit Board more legible
- More atmospheric animations and creepy crawlies
- Additional set dressing
- Reliable respawning of items
